items.text: During deserialization, you would want Jackson to deserialize the “Vehicle” JSON object to the appropriate “Car” or “Plane” class.
items.href: Jackson Polymorphic Deserialization | by David Truong | Medium

items.text: We can do that using the @JsonTypeInfo and @JsonSubTypes annotations.
items.href: Jackson Polymorphic Deserialization | by David Truong | Medium
Jackson Polymorphic Deserialization | by David Truong | Medium
